analysis.description:
Shakedown0x.startDate (/unique_contracts/0x2b319ebea4ce46899171803956093d31830da508.sol#111-112) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- fallback (/unique_contracts/0x2b319ebea4ce46899171803956093d31830da508.sol#223-235)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0x2b319ebea4ce46899171803956093d31830da508.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_contracts/0x2b319ebea4ce46899171803956093d31830da508.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_contracts/0x2b319ebea4ce46899171803956093d31830da508.sol#89) is not in mixedCase
